title: Ep. 58. Lunar Interlude V: Reunion Tour - Part One
description: Our heroes' party has just undergone a fairly shocking expansion. They're now tasked with an infiltration mission that hits close to home. As the pieces move into place for the endgame, what do our heroes hope to find -- and where do their allegiances lie? Merle goes along for the ride. Magnus faces a difficult decision. Taako makes one last deal.
author: shows@themcelroy.family (The McElroys)
